More commonly, this condition results from new mutations in the gene. These cases occur in people with no history of the disorder in their family.",GHR,Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome
What are the treatments for Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome
